attributes.action: David Cameron is making a total mess of the country. To the house of commons to call a vote of no confidence in David Cameron
attributes.additional_details: He will not give the British voters a referendum on the EU , He has destroyed our armed forces , The NHS , Introduced bedroom tax and is making the poor poorer. He has rushed through a bill of same sex marriage and ignored a majority that do not want it ,  He doesn't listen to the people in his party or the British people.  We do not want David Cameron leading our country he is not up to the job and we call for IMMEDIATE vote of no confidence in David Cameron.
